definitions.definition: An act in which a company downsizes or is downsized.
examples: He lost his job in the last downsizing .

definitions.definition: Reducing engine's capacity at same power or increasing engine's power without increasing capacity.
examples: Downsizing is one of the leading trends in automotive engine design.

main_definition: An act in which a company downsizes or is downsized.
secondary_definitions: ( automotive ) Reducing engine's capacity at same power or increasing engine's power without increasing capacity.
